评论详情: The jacket’s material is much thinner than I expected, especially for the price, but it’s well made, looks great on, and is perfect for a summer coverup over a tank top or sports bra. I am 5’7” and 160 lbs. The large fits well and I don’t feel like a stuffed sausage. I could go down a size but I’m happy with the mobility of this size. It has 4 pockets and very nice quality zippers. The pocket zippers are pretty and dainty. I’ll def be buying more! They come in a wide range of pretty colors, I wish they had dark purple, red, and a few other deeper and richer colors as well cuz I can only do light hues for so long… 😂 I highly recommend!

评论概述: I love this lightweight SPF jacket
评论详情: Lightweight, and not too hot, perfect for cool mornings or sun protection on a warmer day. Fit was great, I am between a medium and large in tops because I am average size but large busted. I am using this for hikes and athletics outdoors so went with a large and it fits great, a little room but not baggy at all. Very happy.

This is a nice lightweight material that would definitely be useful for hiking, running, day out with the family, etc. I personally bought it because I wear neon on family outings so my little ones are able to spot me easily.  The material is very stretchy, but shows everything underneath. I'm 5'1, 156 lbs, 42-38-43. Worth noting this isn't my usual size but I had a baby recently, so I ordered a size large because of my bust size, and the bust was the most fitted part of it, but it was big everywhere else, and I imagine would be too big in the bust once I stop breastfeeding. I wish I'd gone with my usual size medium, but with how stretchy and long it is, I think I probably could have pulled off a small if it were a bit thicker.  It would have served the purpose of my family being able to spot me in crowded places, but I neither loved how baggy it seemed, nor how oddly unforgiving it was, showing every detail of what I was wearing underneath, nor how long it was- this is not for someone with a short torso. Also, the color was definitely paler than expected for neon, like if pastel neon is a thing then this would be it. So, I returned it, but I will say the material was very lightweight and comfortable.
Lightweight which is great for FL. I bought this is many colors. Fit is consistent with what I usually wear.
I love the color and I get so many compliments. Very comfortable.  This is my 3rd one I have bought.  All are different colors.  Colors look like the pictures.  Good price too.

This jacket is fairly good quality.  I bought the bright yellow so people can see me when I'm out walking and won't hit me with their car.  Definitely is nice and bright which was what I was looking for.  I bought a thin jacket because I can't seem to wear sunscreen without getting a rash.  The jacket is nice and thin, keeps me cool enough in 90 degree weather walking and still protects my skin.  My only minus is how it looks on my 5'1" frame.  It is a bit long and looks a little strange on me because of it.  Other than that it functions well and the pockets inside and outside are very useful.

评论概述: Great price; great fit; great color
评论详情: I purchased this because I wanted an inexpensive little jacket that packs easily in a carry-on bag, beach bag or work bag. I got the blue green color, and I get compliments every time time I wear it. It's very comfortable, and I like the fit. I have similar zip up jackets that cost over $100, and I like this jacket the best. I usually wear a medium or large, but I got this in an extra large so I can layer it.

The lightweight blue Magcomsen jacket I ordered arrived on time. Though it's a nice blue color, the brighter light made it look grey. I ordered a size bigger, XL because I may layer when I travel or go outside. It's UPF 50, protecting against UV radiation from the sun. I like the fiber because it easily dries, doesn't require ironing, and has tiny holes which allows the skin to "breathe". The hue is the perfect shade of blue. Its sleeves are a bit longer but that's a minor thing. The sleeves have a thumb hole to fully protect from the sun. It also has 2 outside zippered pockets & 2 inner ones. I can't emphasize enough the value of pockets when traveling. This jacket is quite useful when traveling or living in sunny places. It's lightweight, so it's convenient to add to a backpack or carry on bag. Recommended.
This looked good on me and fit nicely.

Unfortunately size medium is too tight through the chest and torso for my 5' 2" wife. This is a form fitting piece. Quality though, looks quite good and color selection is great. If you are thin this will fit perfect.
This is a lightweight jacket that can be used easily in Florida.. mainly for those cool days.
Very comfortable. Nice color and soft fabric

Otherwise, I would say this is great for those days you need something to put on in the morning and stow in your bad later in the day.
Perfect for when all you need is something lightweight.  Nice smooth zipper.  Love the thumb loops!  I wear it a lot!
The jacket is very soft and comfortable. A bit bigger than the small size it was rated.

I like the weight of this jacket.  I wear it mostly for golf.  It also has pockets which is a bonus.  I ordered a medium and fits perfect.
